english.segment1: I see you in the valley. Transferring death for life. I see an army coming. They all bear your light
english.segment2: I am not bound to reason. I live in violent love. This world can not define me. My hearts set above
english.segment3: For me to live it Christ. For me to die is gain. I am not shrinking back. I'll never be the same
english.segment4: Four walls can not contain me. I know I've been possessed. I know that God is love. And there's no failing love. So I am fearless
english.segment5: Come, love is overtaking me now.
english.segment6: Ch 1: This is the sound. of a revolution.
english.segment7: This is the sound. of a prophet's cry.
english.segment8: This is the sound. of a reformation.
english.segment9: This is the sound. of a warrior bride.
english.segment10: This is the sound. of a giants falling.
english.segment11: This is the sound. that you can't ignore.
english.segment12: This is the sound. of a rebel rising.
english.segment13: This is the sound. of an open door.
english.segment14: Ch2: God, release the sound. Release the movement. I'm laying down everything
english.segment15: God, you promised nations. I want the nations. I'm not gonna settle, now. I, I hear the cry. I hear the longing. This is the sound of freedom
english.segment16: I stand in the gap. I stand here praying. For the next. Great Awakening
english.segment18: Revival's not an epic or a mission
english.segment19: Revival's not program. or a play
english.segment20: Revival is not a slogan. Revival is a man. His name is Jesus
